snippet: A judge has temporarily blocked the state’s new voter identification law, weeks before the state’s April 3 presidential primary.
abstract: Judge David Flanagan temporarily blocks Wisconsin's new voter identification law, weeks before the state’s presidential primary, as part of a lawsuit brought by the NAACP.
lead_paragraph: A judge has temporarily blocked the state’s new voter identification law, weeks before the state’s April 3 presidential primary.

headline.main: Wisconsin: Judge Blocks Law on Voter IDs
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Judge Blocks Law On Voter Ids

keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
